stick.name: Stick
stick.description: Found in area 0 using `find`. Used to create basic equipment and logs.

log.name: Log
log.description: Found in area 0 using `find` or in higher areas using `chop`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier wood materials.

pebble.name: Pebble
pebble.description: Found in area 0 using `find`. Used to create basic equipment and stones.

stone.name: Stone
stone.description: Found in area 0 using `find` or in higher areas using `mine`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier rock materials.

copper_ore.name: Copper Ore
copper_ore.description: Found in area 1 using `mine`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier rock materials.

copper_ingot.name: Copper Ingot
copper_ingot.description: Found in area 0 using `find` or in higher areas using `mine`. Used to create higher level equipment and higher tier rock materials.

basic sword.name: Basic Sword
basic sword.description: First sword that you can make. Craftable in area 0. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

basic shield.name: Basic Shield
basic shield.description: First shield that you can make. Craftable in area 0. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

stone axe.name: Stone Axe
stone axe.description: First axe that you can make. Craftable in area 0. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

stone pickaxe.name: Stone Pickaxe
stone pickaxe.description: First pickaxe that you can make. Craftable in area 0. Use `adv recipes equipment` for ingredients.

health potion.name: Health Potion
health potion.description: Used to fully heal the player using `adv heal`. Buyable in the shop. To see shop stock use `adv shop`

cowhide.name: Cowhide
cowhide.description: Item dropped from <:cowEro:810927764109787158> found in area 1. Used to make leather. Use `adv recipes items` for recipes.

leather.name: Leather
leather.description: Crafted by using cowhide, sticks and logs. Recipe found in `adv recipes items`. Used to create armor.

healthpotion.name: Health Potion
healthpotion.description: Use this potion with `adv heal` to fully heal your hp.
